title: VEVOR 7ft Billiards Table Pool Table Set Black Cloth for Family Game Room
itemDescription:
Product Description
Billiard table: Get a moment to relax & Let go of your worries
Looking for a competition-level billiard table? Our billiards table is just what you need. With a table weight exceeding 240 pounds, ultra-stable leg design, exquisite metal corners and pocket design, and flawless thick felt, you can play confidently without fear!
Our billiard tables are made of thickened MDF fiberboard. Quality begins with the raw materials, giving you peace of mind.
Our pool table set come with a full set of accessories, so you don't have to worry about purchasing additional sets.
Upon receiving the billiard table, you'll find the tabletop pre-installed, simply attach the legs to start playing immediately. General advice: Please do not place it in direct sunlight, rain, or humid areas. When not in use, it is recommended to cover it with a dust and rain protective cover.
A good billiard table significantly enhances the playing experience. Suitable for home/club/lounge/villa/company recreational use, our tables are made with genuine materials and offer a smooth playing experience, letting you enjoy the quality of a competition-level billiard table.
  Features & Details
  Weight-Bearing and Stability: Chosen for its MDF fiberboard, which is scratch-resistant, wear-resistant, moisture-proof, and anti-corrosive, ensuring durability. The billiard table's weight exceeds 240 pounds, with ultra-stable leg design, providing you with championship-quality billiard gameplay.
Professional Playing Feel: The pool table features a thickened felt cloth that resists pilling and friction, allowing for smooth ball movement. Metal corners designed to prevent collisions, ensuring safer play. Exquisite pocket design prevents balls from flying out and cushions the impact of balls entering, offering a professional playing experience.
Complete Accessories: Comes with a full set of billiard accessories. Order now to receive American-style pool balls: 1 box, 1 plastic triangle, 1 plastic brush, 2 cue sticks, 4 black leveling shims and 2 chalks.
Easy to Assemble: No need to worry about complicated assembly. The billiard table set is pre-assembled when you receive it; you only need to attach the legs to start enjoying. Clear assembly step instructions will also be provided.
Suitable for Multiple Scenarios: The game room pool table is designed in a modern rustic style, easily beautifying your home space while offering both aesthetic appeal and entertainment functionality, giving you a championship-level quality experience. Suitable for home/club/lounge/villa/company entertainment. Do not place the billiard table in direct sunlight, rain, or damp conditions. It is recommended to cover it with a dust and rain protective cover when not in use to extend its lifespan.

title: Wireless Cell Phone Game Controller Gamepad Joystick Receiver for iPhone iOS
itemDescription:
About this item
Move like A Boss with Joystick: Compatible with iPhone 13 Pro Max, 13 Pro, 13, 13 mini, iPhone 12 Pro Max, 12 Pro, 12, 12 mini, 11 Pro Max, 11 Pro, 11, Xs Max, Xs, X, 8 Plus, 8, 7 Plus, 7 Plus, 7 (iOS 13.4 or Later)
Pure Physical Control: The YAO Mobile Joystick features 12bit ADC Module, brings back the familiar physical movement to mobile games. offers gamer percise and fluid control over in-game character, complex and trick moves can be achieved easily. Textured Joystick for more comfort and grip
Plug and Play: The YAO Mobile Joystick Compact and lightweight, fits in your pocket. No baterry inside, low power consumption. For the best gaming experience, it is highly recommended to remove your phone case before plug in the joystick.
Charging while Playing: The joystick come with a USB-C charging port. No need to worry about low battery during Ganking again. Just plug in your charging cable and enjoy the long gaming sessions.
Perfect for games with on screen joystick control like Wild Rift, Genshin Impact, COD mobile,Mobile Legends, Arena of Valor, FIFA, NAB 2K. Worry-free Sales Service: 1 year Warranty. Please feel free to contact us at any time.
Product Description
IFYOO YAO L1 PRO Mobile Phone Game Controller Joystick for iPhone (iOS 13.4 or Later , For iOS Mobile Games), Gaming Gamepad Jostick Compatible with PUBGG, Call of Duty(CODM), Wild Rift, Genshin Impact - Black

Compatibility
1) Compatible with iPhone 13 Pro Max, 13 Pro, 13, 13 mini, iPhone 12 Pro Max, 12 Pro, 12, 12 mini, 11 Pro Max, 11 Pro, 11, Xs Max, Xs, X, 8 Plus, 8, 7 Plus, 7 Plus, 7 (iOS 13.4 or Later)
2) Compatible with most games with On Screen Joystick Control like Wild Rift, PUBGG, Call of Duty, Genshin Impact Arena of Valor, FIFA, NAB 2K,


Features
1) Physical Joystick with 12 bit ADC Module, offers mobile gamer Precise and Fluid Physical Control
2) Plug and Play
3) Portable, Compact and lightweight, fits in your pocket
4) Charing while Playging,come with Lightning charging port
5) Textured Joystick for more comfort and grip
 
Package List
1x YAO L1 Pro Mobile Joystick
1x User Manual
  About this item
DOES NOT support the mobile phone with MediaTek CPU. Move like A Boss with Joystick: Compatible with most of Android Mobile Phones(Samsung, Oneplus, Huawei…) with Type C USB Port.
Pure Physical Control: The YAO Mobile Joystick features 12bit ADC Module, brings back the familiar physical movement to mobile games. offers gamer percise and fluid control over in-game character, complex and trick moves can be achieved easily. Textured Joystick for more comfort and grip
Plug and Play: The YAO Mobile Joystick Compact and lightweight, fits in your pocket. No baterry inside, low power consumption. For the best gaming experience, it is highly recommended to remove your phone case before plug in the joystick.
Charging while Playing: The joystick come with a Lightning charging port. No need to worry about low battery during Ganking again. Just plug in your charging cable and enjoy the long gaming sessions.
Perfect for games with on screen joystick control like Wild Rift, Genshin Impact, COD mobile,Mobile Legends, Arena of Valor, FIFA, NAB 2K. Worry-free Sales Service: 1 year Warranty. Please feel free to contact us at any time.
Precise Physical Control
The YAO mobile joystick brings back the familiar physical movement, offers gamer percise and fluid control over in-game character.
Plug & Play, Portable
The YAO mobile joystick Compact and lightweight, fits right in your pocket.
Charging while Playing
The joystick come with a Type-C USB charging port. No need to worry about low battery during ganking again.
YAO N1 Pro Joystick for Android Quick Start Guide
Step 1: Enable USB Debugging
Go to Setting > About Phone > Press Build number 5 -7 times until developer Options enabled, then go to System > Developer Options > Enable USB Debugging.
Step 2: Download & install the YAO APP
You can scan the QR Code on the package or go to lvfan.world to download and install the Yao mobile assistant App.
Step 3: Enable Display over other APPS & Turn On Screen Auto Rotate
Go to the APP info of the YAO App, and grant the Allow Display over other apps Permissions. Then turn on screen auto rotate.
Step 4: Activate the Joystick
Press the joystick down button and then insert the joystick into your phone until the USB debuggingpops up windows appear, then release the joystick , click OK, and wait for the activation to be completed.
During the activation process, the LED green light flashes, After activation, the LED green light is always on and the App shows that the mapping has been activated.
Step 5: Unplug and Replug the Joystick
After the activation completed, unplug the joystick then re-plug the joystick, wait until the red LED light turns on which indicate successfully connected (This step is very critical).
You need to reactivate the joystick if the phone was rebooted.
Step 6: Set up the in Game Joystick
1: Adding the game you want to play in the Yao App.
2: Run the game through the Yao app by tapping the game icon.
3: After the game loaded, setup the on screen joystick, by tapping the YAO App’s floating icon, drag the red dot and position it on the on screen joystick. Refine the size and position.
(After a game has been configured, you don't need to run the game from the Yao App the next time you play it)
